elements.title: Pipeline - Most Recently Closed Quarter
elements.description: Shows cumulative obligations, disbursements, accruals, and pipeline (unexpended balance) of both Program and OE funds, excluding trust funds, for the last quarter.

elements.title: Pipeline - Including Subcommitments & Subobligations
elements.description: Shows cumulative obligations, disbursements, accruals, and pipeline (unexpended balance) of both Program and OE funds for the last quarter.

elements.title: Doing Business 2014
elements.description: This report integrates USAID corporate data with related datasets from the IMF, World Bank, U.S. government agencies and other sources.

elements.title: Afghanistan and Pakistan Trends Reports
elements.description: This report integrates USAID corporate data on Afghanistan and Pakistan with related datasets from the IMF, World Bank, U.S. government agencies and other sources.

elements.title: Middle East and North Africa Trends Report
elements.description: This report integrates USAID corporate data on the Middle East and North Africa with related datasets from the IMF, World Bank, U.S. government agencies and other sources.

elements.title: Agency Business Forecast
elements.description: The Agency Business Forecast is posted externally on the USAID website and is critical tool for small businesses, local partners and industry wide usersto prepare for future or current RFP/RFA/RFQ/APS releases.

elements.title: M/CFO/CAR Appropriation Status Report
elements.description: Shows the fund status of current fiscal year appropriations in Phoenix, excluding local currency trust funds.

elements.title: M/CFO/CAR Funds Control Apportionment Report
elements.description: Used to reconcile Phoenix budget transactions to the SF-132 Apportionment and Reapportionment Schedule.

elements.title: OE Budget Status
elements.description: Shows the budget status for all unexpired funds for administrative funds. It shows budget authority and spending on a cumulative basis, as well as what is currently available for commitment and obligation.

elements.title: Program Budget Status
elements.description: Shows the budget status for all unexpired funds for program funds. It shows budget authority and spending on a cumulative basis, as well as what is currently available for commitment and obligation.

elements.title: Budget Query Lite - OE Funds
elements.description: Shows budget and spending amounts up and down the budget chain across budgets for current year Administrative funds, excluding trust funds.

elements.title: Budget Query Lite - Program Funds
elements.description: Shows budget and spending amounts up and down the budget chain across budgets for current year Program funds, excluding trust funds.

elements.title: Flash Report - OE Funds
elements.description: Shows current year Budget Authority and Current Year Spending, excluding local currency trust funds, for administrative funds.

elements.title: Flash Report - Program Funds
elements.description: Shows current year Budget Authority and Current Year Spending, excluding local currency trust funds, for program funds.

elements.title: Mission Flash Report
elements.description: Shows current year Budget Authority and Current Year Spending, excluding local currency trust funds, for mission program and administrative funds.

elements.title: Flash Report – OE OYB
elements.description: Show current year Budget Authority and Current Year Spending, excluding local currency trust funds, for OE funds, and with a focus on Operating Year Budget.

elements.title: Obligations by EOCC - OE and Program
elements.description: Shows obligations by Expanded Object Class Code (EOCC) at a budget strip level.

elements.title: OE Obligations by OCC - Obligation Document Level
elements.description: Shows obligation information by Object Class Code (OCC) and it is intended to help Operating Units and Missions prepare and manage their OE budgets.

elements.title: Obligations by Framework
elements.description: Shows program-funded obligation amounts by Framework Code (Objective, Program Area, and Program Element), excluding trust funds.

elements.title: Open Commitment Status
elements.description: Shows all open commitment amounts (committed but not obligated), including trust funds, by Op Unit and Distribution.

elements.title: Unliquidated Obligations
elements.description: Shows the cumulative obligations, disbursements, and unliquidated balance of bothpProgram and Administrative funds, excluding accruals and trust funds.

elements.title: Unliquidated Obligations - Including Subcommitments & Subobligations
elements.description: Shows the current cumulative obligations, disbursements, and unliquidated balance of both program and administrative funds, excluding accruals.

elements.title: Comprehensive Vendor Obligations
elements.description: Shows cumulative obligations broken down by vendor location, vendor category, and the vendor common name.

elements.title: Comprehensive Vendor Obligations Version 2
elements.description: Shows cumulative obligations broken down by vendor location, vendor category, and the vendor common name.

elements.title: Base Education Pipeline BBFY 2007 - 2013
elements.description: This report shows a seven year pipeline analysis for basic education programming conducted for the USAID E3 Bureau.

elements.title: Basic Education Pipeline by Country
elements.description: This report shows a seven year pipeline analysis for basic education programming for 12 missions conducted for the USAID E3 Bureau.

elements.title: Status of Open Audit Recommendations
elements.description: Shows the status of OIG and GAO open audit recommendations.

elements.title: Internal Control Deficiencies
elements.description: Shows the status of deficiencies identified through audit findings from various sources (e.g., Assessmenta, Management Reviews, Federal Managers Financial Integrity Act.

elements.title: Current FY Recoveries Withdrawn
elements.description: Shows information on deobligations of prior year obligations that have been withdrawn through the budget hierarchy to the appropriation level.

elements.title: Where Does USAID Money Go? – Excel
elements.description: A high level summary of the amount of money USAID spends in different countries or regions around the world for the previous fiscal year.

elements.title: Where Does USAID Money Go? – PDF
elements.description: A high level summary of the amount of money USAID spends in different countries or regions around the world for the previous fiscal year.

elements.title: FY 2014 New Obligating Authority Tracking
elements.description: This report compares the Final 653(a) with the most recent changes to the Foreign Assistance budget to allow users to track New Obligating Authorities.

elements.title: Congressional Budget Justification (CJB) by Framework
elements.description: This report contains the budget levels that were published in the Congressional Budget Justification (CJB) for fiscal year 2014.

elements.title: USAID Indicators - Malaria West Africa FY 13
elements.description: This report shows performance on selected malaria indicators for West Africa (FY 2013). Figures are pulled from the Dollars to Results data set.

report.url: assets/images/reports/USAID F Standard Indicators - Malaria West Africa FY 13.pdf

elements.title: USAID Indicators - Malaria West Africa FY 13
elements.description: This report shows performance on selected malaria indicators for West Africa (FY 2013). Figures are pulled from the Dollars to Results data set.

report.url: assets/images/reports/USAID F Standard Indicators - Malaria West Africa FY 13.pdf

elements.title: FY 2014 New Obligating Authority Tracking
elements.description: This report compares the Final 653(a) with the most recent changes to the Foreign Assistance budget to allow users to track New Obligating Authorities.
